I am based in the Netherlands (Amsterdam-area), Cardano-believer since 2017, ADA-hodler through good times and bad, and passionate about sustainably building and enjoying our new decentralized, equal-opportunity economy, together.
about.server: Solar powered, bare-metal local servers, connected to a high-bandwidth, low-latency Internet connection. With the Amsterdam-IX, which is the world's 2nd largest Internet-Exchange, just around the corner, we are well positioned for fast and reliable block propagation.
about.company: Backed by serious pledge from enthusiastic delegators from the ITN, who firmly believe in our sustainable, no-nonsense, Cloud-less approach to staking, Staking4ADA aims to help the Cardano network grow, and become the global financial operating system we all know it can be.
